snippet.title: Katamari Damacy Rolling LIVE - iOS (Apple Arcade) Gameplay
snippet.description:
Roll, stick, and grow!

The quirky action game "Katamari Damacy"

where you grow your katamari by collecting objects

is now on Apple Arcade!

[Features]

◆Roll, stick, and grow! Enjoy this easy, addictive game by just "rolling"! Stick everything from tiny trinkets to huge objects and watch your katamari grow!

◆Collect all kinds of items scattered across the Earth to complete the "Collection".

◆Grab "Royal Presents" along the way to unlock “Channel Badges” and "Costumes".

◆Search for hidden "Cousins" and you can play as your favorite ones.

[How to Play]

◆Just roll and stick items to your katamari!

◆Complete the King's objectives and turn your Katamari into a beautiful star that lights up the night sky!

============================================================

Please follow us on twitter (X) : https://x.com/vickymyngko

Apple Arcade: https://bit.ly/4lg2yHY

Businness Inquiries: evilsearch@yahoo.com


============================================================
